sentences.english: Langshan landscape area is a new discovered famous scenic area in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 崀山风景区的造景地貌是丹霞地貌。

sentences.english: Lang Shan locates in Xinning County, Hunan Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 崀山位于中国湖南省新宁县境内。

sentences.english: Exhibition staff to prepare the guests taste the orange Langshan .
sentences.chinese: 展销工作人员为来宾准备品尝的崀山脐橙。
